TopicTitle: New Updates? Things to watch out for?

Articles.Content:
Hello, 

I've been taking quite a long break from KSP and the last time I played they had just released the language pack. Returning, I'm just curious if anyone has heard any rumors of new updates to come and what they may entail. Also anything I may need to watch out for returning?

Thank you in advance.

-Leafy

Check the Weeklys over in The Daily Kerbal section of the forums. They're posted every Friday and contain pretty much everything that's been talked about. In short, they're still fixing the console versions and working on the PC version DLC + required update. If you want details, there's probably close to 30 Weeklys since you last checked in.
That is where the news can be found.
